TEXT.English: The Shrine of Survival is the center from which the value of Survival is maintained and spread. It also functions as a Survival Dome itself while still allowing one to be built on the same planet.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Shrine of Survival[COLOR_REVERT] produces one gold each turn for every star system that has the value of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Survival[COLOR_REVERT] and provides additional Influence to the system. It also helps spread [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Survival[COLOR_REVERT] throughout the galaxy. Further, it has the same additional effect as a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Survival Dome[COLOR_REVERT]: it provides a bonus to health. The system must be the founding location of the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Power[COLOR_REVERT] value to construct this world wonder.

TEXT.English: The development of nanotechnology eventually lead to the ability to flawlessly connect the human nervous system to mechanical systems. This inevitably leads to the ability to communicate with computer systems to both control them and receive information from them directly without the need for other controls or data displays. Such interfaces allow starship crews to "see" using the ship sensors - and also hear, smell, taste, and touch via mapping various sensor systems to the various senses - allowing for the rapid interpretation of data and a reduced time to act on the data. All warships rapidly convert to using direct mind-machine controls (known as the Neural Interface), giving a small but useful increase to their combat capabilities. This specific development also allows a greatly improved ability to repair damage to the nervous system, greatly improved mechanical prosthetics, and the ability to connect cloned body parts to the body perfectly so that it is difficult even to detect that such a replacement has been made.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Mind-Machine Interface[COLOR_REVERT] allows the construction of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Nanotech Hospital[COLOR_REVERT] Building, which increases [ICON_HEALTHY], [ICON_HAPPY], and influence in the Star System it's built. It also enables the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Neural Interface[COLOR_REVERT] upgrade and grants it to all starships for free.

TEXT.English: The first practical advancement gained from the study of quantum control turns out to be the very important invention of power supplies that work by, essentially, converting matter directly to energy. This improves the power systems of starships allowing them to more easily produce the negative energy used to propel them and also to produce more power for all other systems including weapons. A byproduct of all this is the new Q-Missile, which has better characteristics (for a missile) than either the [ICON_POWER] anti-ship missile or the [ICON_POWER] assault missile, making both of them obsolete.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Quantum Power[COLOR_REVERT] increases [ICON_HEALTHY] and [ICON_HAPPY] everywhere. It makes all starships faster and construction ships build improvements 25% faster. It also enables both of the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Quantum Engines[COLOR_REVERT] upgrades which makes ships faster still, and increases the range of squadrons and missiles as well as the range of starbase weapons, and increases their combat strength. The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Quantum Engines (Range)[COLOR_REVERT] upgrade is granted to all starbases, squadrons, and missiles for free.

It also enables both of the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Quantum Engines[COLOR_REVERT] upgrades which makes ships faster still, and increases the range of squadrons and missiles as well as the range of starbase weapons, and increases their combat strength. The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Quantum Engines (Range)[COLOR_REVERT] upgrade is granted to all starbases, squadrons, and missiles for free.

The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Quantum Engines (Range)[COLOR_REVERT] upgrade is granted to all starbases, squadrons, and missiles for free.

TEXT.English: As the full extent of the knowledge in the Lambda-VC beacon was determined, the research that was intended to lead to the full and accurate transcription of the human mind into a computer was persued. The improving nanotechnology used in the mind-machine interface, medicine, and cybernetics combined with the miniaturization of quantum power systems lead to the next step closer to the goal of effecive immortality for humans. Using nanotechnological cybernetic systems, whether embeded in the existing body parts or replacing them entirely, it becomes possible to heal nearly any injury and enhance the capabilities of people to what used to be considered super-human levels. This can be done for both the physical capabilities and the mind, via tightly integrated nanocomputer sysems which enhance memory, mathematical calculations, and a variety of other capabilities via the use of the same sorts of technology developed with the Intuative Computers technology running the Extended Range Systems algorithms. Some beleive that integrating computer systems into the human mind is contrary to the goal of copying the mind into a computer, in part because the continued advancement of the computer technologies makes it even harder to define what is supposed to be copied into the computer. With the realization that it is already possible to use nanotech assembers to build a complete cybernetic body, some researchers join together in a direct attempt to complete the ELO's Human Consciousness Project and create a purely constructed human including the complete and accurate transcription of a human mind, as it currently exists, into its cybernetic brain. They beleive success is inevitable and near.

TEXT.English: Assault Missiles are a one-time use weapon which can be carried by Cruisers and are cheap and effective, but they are vulnerable to enemy Destroyers. This type of missile is stronger when attacking units in cities, but weaker when they are not. In either case, they also cause a small amount of collateral damage.

TEXT.English: The Great Rings Park is a tourist resort built on a small moon in a gap in a planet's rings. The rings are some of the most spectacular known.

TEXT.English: The Botanical Gardens wonder is an enormous system of botanical gardens located on one planet which provides seeds and young plants for more standard sized botanical gardens on the other planets in the system.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]When trade with Earth was lost, biological diversity became a problem. This collection of all available plant life helps maintain more diversified and healthier ecosystems.

TEXT.English: Weaker than most starships, the Stealth Ship's advantage is being invisible to all other types of starship except other Stealth Ships and ships of the Recon Unit type (Scouts and Recon Ships).
TEXT.French: Le vaisseau furtif est plus faible que la plupart des vaisseaux stellaires, mais il a l'avantage d'être invisible aux yeux de tous, à l'exception des autres vaisseaux furtifs et les navires de type unitaire Recon (Scouts et Recon Ships).
TEXT.German: Das Tarnschiff ist zwar schwächer als die meisten Raumschiffe, es hat jedoch den Vorteil, dass es für alle anderen Raumschifftypen unsichtbar ist, mit Ausnahme anderer Tarnschiffe und Schiffe der Recon Gertetyp (Pfadfinder und Recon Ships).
TEXT.Italian: La nave invisibile è più debole delle altre navi, ma il suo vantaggio è nell'essere invisibile per tutte le navi spaziali, tranne che per altre navi invisibili e le navi del tipo di unit Recon (Scout e Navi Recon).
TEXT.Spanish: La nave invisible es más débil que la mayoría de las naves, pero es imperceptible ante cualquier otra, excepto las de su mismo tipo y los buques del tipo de la Unidad de Recon (Scouts y Recon Buques).

TEXT.English: The Spaceport increases [ICON_GOLD] output and [ICON_COMMERCE] from Trade Routes, providing more money for the treasury when Commerce %% is allocated to Gold, although it requires a Banking System already be built on the Planet.
TEXT.French: Le Régie spatiale améliore la production de [ICON_GOLD] et [ICON_COMMERCE] des routes commerciales et augmente la trésorerie quand les revenus du commerce sont alloués à l'or. La construction préalable d'un Système bancaire est requise.
TEXT.German: Das Raumhafen steigert den [ICON_GOLD]-Ausstoß und [ICON_COMMERCE]-Ausstoß auf Handelswegen und stellt mehr Geld für die Schatzkammer zur Verfügung, wenn ein %%-Anteil der Wirtschaft dem Gold zugewiesen wird. Voraussetzung ist ein bestehendes Bankwesen auf dem Planeten.
TEXT.Italian: Il Spazioporto aumenta la resa di [ICON_GOLD] e [ICON_COMMERCE] dalle Rotte commerciali, producendo più soldi quando il Commercio %% è assegnato all'Oro, anche se è necessario che sul pianeta sia già presente un Sistema bancario.
TEXT.Spanish: El puerto espacial incrementa el rendimiento del [ICON_GOLD] y el [ICON_COMMERCE] de las rutas comerciales y proporciona al tesoro más dinero cuando un porcentaje del comercio se destina a oro, aunque precisa que se construya antes un Sistema Bancario en el planeta.

TEXT.English: The Stardock adds a trade route and increases [ICON_COMMERCE] from Trade Routes, providing a greater benefit to Star Systems which have many such routes.
TEXT.French: Le Dock interstellaire ajoute une route de commerce et améliore le niveau de [ICON_COMMERCE] des routes commerciales, augmentant les profits des systèmes stellaires concernés par ces routes.
TEXT.German: Das Sternendock fügt eine Handelsstraße und steigert den [ICON_COMMERCE]-Ausstoß auf Handelswegen und bringt so Sternensystemen einen Vorteil, die über viele solcher Wege verfügen.
TEXT.Italian: Il Porto spaziale aggiunge una rotta commerciale e aumenta [ICON_COMMERCE] dalle Rotte commerciali, fornendo maggiori benefici ai sistemi solari che ne hanno molte.
TEXT.Spanish: El muelle espacial agrega una ruta de comercio y incrementa el [ICON_COMMERCE] de las rutas comerciales, proporcionando mayores beneficios a los sistemas estelares que cuenten con muchas de tales rutas.

TEXT.English: The Astral Gate is believed to be the missing link between humanity and a greater plane which lies beyond our everyday perception. Research by Jing Shen has theorized that mankind may enter its next true phase of evolution through the construction of a portal to this plane. This project is for developing the theoretical basis and basic design parameters for the construction of an astral gate. The result of such endeavors will only be discovered when we have completed this massive project...
TEXT.French: Le Portail Astral est supposé créer un lien entre l'humanité et un plan supérieur, au-delà de ce que nous percevons. Les recherches de Jing Shen ont permis d'émettre la théorie selon laquelle l'humanité pourrait entrer dans sa prochaine phase d'évolution grâce à la construction d'un portail vers ce plan. Les schémas et l'organisation sont en cours, et les scientifiques pensent que la construction des pièces nécessaires pour activer ce portail est possible à présent. Le résultat d'une telle expérience ne sera connu que lorsque nous aurons achevé ce projet colossal...
TEXT.German: Das Astraltor scheint die fehlende Verbindung zwischen Menschheit und einer größeren Ebene zu sein, die über unsere alltägliche Vorstellungskraft hinausgeht. In seinen Forschungen stellt Jian Shen die Theorie auf, dass die Menschheit durch die Errichtung eines Tors zu dieser Ebene ihre nächste echte Evolutionsphase einläutet. Die Planung hat begonnen und Wissenschaftler glauben, dass der Bau der für die Aktivierung des Tors notwendigen Teile nun möglich ist. Das Ergebnis unseres Bestrebens werden wir erst dann sehen, wenn wir dieses Riesenprojekt vollständig abgeschlossen haben ...
TEXT.Italian: Si pensa che il portale astrale sia l'anello mancante tra l'umanità e un piano superiore giacente al di là della nostra percezione quotidiana. Le ricerche di Jing Shen hanno ipotizzato che l'umanità possa accedere al suo prossimo vero stadio evolutivo costruendo un portale che conduca a quel piano. La progettazione è andata avanti e oggi gli scienziati credono che la costruzione delle componenti necessarie per attivare il portale sia possibile. I frutti di queste ricerche saranno visibili solo quando avremo portato a termine questo immenso progetto...
TEXT.Spanish: Se cree que la puerta astral es el vínculo perdido entre la humanidad y un plano superior que se encuentra más allá de nuestra percepción cotidiana. La investigación de Jian Shen teoriza que la humanidad entrará en su siguiente estadio de evolución mediante la construcción de un portal a ese plano. Se ha planificado todo minuciosamente y los científicos creen que ya es posible la construcción de las piezas necesarias para activar la puerta. El resultado de tales empresas solo se descubrirá cuando hayamos completado este ingente proyecto.

TEXT.English: Important for production of cloth, cotton is a soft fiber which can be extracted from cotton plants. After removal from the plant, the fibers are processed to remove seeds and wax, and then they are spun into threads. Cotton grows well in both tropical and warm temperate climates, and it can be cultivated across much of the inhabited portions of the world.[PARAGRAPH:2]Many civilizations recognized the value cotton very early in their development - examples include the Egyptians, (Asian) Indians and even some pre-Colombian American cultures. The Industrial Revolution saw the invention of the "Spinning Jenny" and cotton gin, which enabled mass production of cotton-based cloth. After these developments the demand for the plant fiber became almost insatiable, driving up labor demands for its cultivation across the world - leading to, among other things, the continuation of slavery in the United States into the mid-nineteenth century. Today, however, most cotton in western nations is harvested mechanically. It remains an important good worldwide.
TEXT.French: Important pour la production de tissus, le coton est une fibre souple extraite de la plante du même nom. Après avoir été séparées de la plante, les fibres sont traitées afin d'en supprimer graines et cire, avant d'être filées. Le coton s'adapte particulièrement aux climats chauds ou tropicaux et peut être cultivé dans de nombreuses régions désertiques du monde.[PARAGRAPH:2]De nombreuses civilisations ont vite compris l'importance que pouvait avoir le coton pour leur développement, par exemple, les Egyptiens, les Indiens (d'Asie) et certaines cultures précolombiennes. L'invention, à la Révolution industrielle, de la "Spinning Jenny" et de l'égreneuse de coton, va permettre une production de masse de vêtements. Après ce développement, la demande pour cette fibre devient presque insatiable, incitant au développement de sa culture à travers le monde, et entraînant, entre autres choses, la poursuite de l'esclavage aux Etats-Unis au XIXe siècle. De nos jours, la plus grande partie des récoltes du monde occidental est effectuée mécaniquement et le coton demeure un produit important dans le monde entier.
TEXT.German: Baumwolle ist eine weiche Faser, die aus der Baumwollpflanze gewonnen und vorwiegend in der Textilfertigung genutzt wird. Nach der Ernte werden die Samenhaare in einem ersten Verarbeitungsprozess zunchst von den Samen sowie von Wachsrckstnden befreit und dann zu Fden gesponnen. Besonders gut gedeiht die Baumwollpflanze in tropischem und warmem Klima, grundstzlich kann sie aber in den meisten bewohnten Gebieten der Erde angebaut werden.[PARAGRAPH:2]Viele Zivilisationen erkannten bereits sehr frh den Wert der Baumwolle, so zum Beispiel die gypter, die Inder sowie einige prkolumbianische Kulturen auf dem amerikanischen Kontinent. Doch erst die Erfindung der "Spinning Jenny" (Spinnmaschine) und der "Cotton Gin" (Egreniermaschine zur Entkrnung von Baumwolle) im Zeitalter der Industriellen Revolution ermglichte die Massenfertigung von Baumwolltextilien. In der darauf folgenden Zeit stieg die Nachfrage nach der Pflanzenfaser schier ins Unermessliche, so dass weltweit Unmengen von Arbeitskrften fr den Anbau der Baumwollpflanze bentigt wurden - dies war unter anderem auch ein Grund dafr, dass die Sklaverei in den Vereinigten Staaten bis Mitte des 19. Jahrhunderts aufrechterhalten blieb. Heute wird Baumwolle, die nach wie vor zu den wichtigsten Handelsgtern der Welt gehrt, in den westlichen Lndern berwiegend mechanisch geerntet.
TEXT.Italian: Importante per la produzione dell'abbigliamento, il cotone una fibra soffice che si estrae dalla pianta di cotone. Dopo essere state estratte dalla pianta, le fibre vengono trattate per privarle di semi e cera, quindi sono filate (tessute in fili). Il cotone cresce bene nei climi tropicali e in quelli temperati e perciò coltivabile in buona parte del mondo abitato.[PARAGRAPH:2]Molte civilt, tra cui Egizi, Indiani (d'Asia) e certe culture pre-colombiane, hanno apprezzato sin da subito il valore del cotone. La Rivoluzione Industriale vide l'introduzione del "filatoio multiplo" e della sgranatrice, che permisero la produzione di massa dei capi in cotone. In seguito a questi sviluppi, la domanda di cotone divenne quasi insaziabile, facendo impennare la domanda di lavoro nelle piantagioni di cotone in tutto il mondo. Questo portò, tra le altre cose, alla continuazione della pratica della schiavit negli Stati Uniti fino alla met del diciannovesimo secolo. Oggi, invece, nelle nazioni occidentali il cotone raccolto meccanicamente e rimane sempre un bene importante.
TEXT.Spanish: Importante para la produccin de tela, el algodn es una fibra suave que se extrae de la planta de algodn. Tras su extraccin, las fibras se procesan para quitarles las semillas y la cera y, a continuacin, se utilizan para formar hebras. El algodn se cultiva en climas tanto tropicales como clidos y puede producirse en buena parte de las regiones habitadas del mundo.[PARAGRAPH:2]Muchas civilizaciones reconocieron el valor del algodn en un momento muy temprano de su desarrollo. Entre los ejemplos ms caractersticos tenemos a los egipcios, los hindes e incluso algunas culturas precolombinas. La Revolucin Industrial asisti a la invencin de "Jenny la hilandera" y de la desmotadora, que permitan la produccin en serie de tela de algodn. Tras estos inventos, la demanda de fibra de algodn se hizo casi insaciable y el cultivo de la planta se extendi por todo el mundo lo que, entre otras cosas, foment la supervivencia de la esclavitud en los Estados Unidos hasta el siglo XIX. En nuestros das, no obstante, en las naciones occidentales el algodn se recoge por medios mecnicos. Sigue siendo una mercanca importantsima en todo el mundo.

TEXT.English: Vacuum engineering represents both equipment that uses of vacuums to do things and equipment designed to function in a vacuum. Many thigns can be done more efficently in a vacuum but the harsh environment of a vacuum presents many engineering problems - for example, things stick togther that you want to slide across each other. Scientists and engineers have now developed techniques to build safe and durable seals, joints, and other such equipment. In conjuntion with good radiation shielding, ships, stations, satellites, and other such thigns can now be built with improved functionality and greatly superior durability. A branch of the research also lead to improved large scale cryogenic systems, leading to the Cryogenic Granary which is able to store food almost indefiniately.

TEXT.English: The Battlecarrier is an attempt to overcome one of the greatest weaknesses of a battleship: the vulnerabuility to squadrons. By incorporating a small facility to carry a squadron the battlecarrier can provide itself with cover from squadron attacks, or do such attacks itself when enemy squadrons are not present. The space required does, however, cause a small reduction in the amount of weaponry the ship can cary and provides a relatively large opening through the hull armor. This makes the battlecarrier inferior to a regular battleship in combat if it cannot use its carried squadron against the enemy, or if it is not carrying one.

TEXT.English: The Battlecruiser is nothing more than a more powerful cruiser. It doesn't need to be anything else - they are excellent ships. Their power to cost ratio is possibly the best of all the ships in use (which is of little solace when a battleships blows the battlecruiser you are on into small chunks). It is 20% stronger than a cruiser and can also reduce an enemy system's defences at a rate that is half way between a cruiser and a battleship.

TEXT.English: The Missile Frigate is a variant of the Destroyer class which is designed to have a ranged strike capability via missiles and provide superior squadron interception capabilities. The trade-off is a reduction in basic combat strength due to the space taken up by the missile bay, however their lower cost allows them to be produced more rapidly and in slightly larger numbers (10 for every 9). The superior weaponry used by the AstroTech Corporation on all of their ships also partly negates the strength reduction.

TEXT.English: The Planetary Seige Unit is a variation of the Invasion Ship with weaponry designed to allow it to reduce a system's defenses like the larger Cruiser and Battleship units can, at the same rate as a Cruiser. These alterations have also increased the collateral damage capability and improved the chances for first strikes.

TEXT.English: The latest improvements in carrier related technology and quantum power systems, engines, and weaponry have lead to the ability to produce a superior squadron with the properties of both the fighter and bomber type squadrons. It is better in the fighter role than an [ICON_POWER] Fighter Squadron. It is also better in the bomber role than an [ICON_POWER] Bomber Squadron. It is expected that the next generation squadrons will once again split functionality into separate fighter and bomber designs, but for now the Q-Squadron is the king of the squadrons in all roles.

TEXT.English: Rapid Construction Ships are the fastest ship until the [ICON_POWER] Destroyer class ships become available. They get to where the work needs to be done and get started building with minimal delay. This helps the Red Syndicate keep those very important trade routes connected. They also finish long projects faster due to the 10% faster build rate. (Apparently Vladimir Korovin is related to Gandhi. Who knew?)

TEXT.English: The Recon Ship is the ultimate information gathering vehicle. It has specialized sensors to extend its sensor range but can also get the standard sensor upgrades to improve it even more. It is fast. It is also capable of attacking other ships, although not very good at it - the only ship you are likely to defeat is a standard Scout Ship, or a Construction Ship, or a ship that has been seriously damaged.

TEXT.English: The Military Science Academy is the premier school of both strategy and tactics. The primary function of the Military Science Academy is to train new starship officers who are on the path to command. Its graduates have extensive knowlege of the theoretical and practical aspects of starship command, including both combat strategy and tactics.

TEXT.English: The ever increasing population pressures faced by colonies have lead to many attempts to improve upon the habitation system design. Advancements in technology utilizing the principles of utilitarianism and the techniques of advanced nanite construction have resulted in the desired improvements. Offering both the ability to build more extensive systems while also increasing the degree of control over the environment, the extended habitation facility allows a larger population to be productive on even the harshest of worlds.

TEXT.English: The presence of the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Grain[COLOR_REVERT] resource increases a planet's food output as it is naturally utilized by the colonists. However, it also allows the introduction of an extensive farming industry with only a modest outlay in industrial and infrastructural improvements, allowing the planet to support a larger productive population. The Farm is not just a farm, but an organized and widespread argiculture industry. This includes the production of farm equipment and on-going efforts into improving techniques and equipment. Continuing research into fertilizers, herbicides, pesticides, and developing grains with improved yields and greater disease resistance also results in a small overall increase in research output in the system.

TEXT.English: The presence of the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Seafood[COLOR_REVERT] resource increases a planet's food output as it is naturally utilized by the colonists. However, it also allows the introduction of an extensive fishing industry with only a modest outlay in industrial and infrastructural improvements, allowing the planet to support a larger productive population. The Harbor is not just a harbor, but an organized and widespread aquaculture system. This includes the production of fishing equipment and on-going efforts into improving techniques and equipment with the goal of having a high but sustainable output. It also involves improvements in the speed and efficiency of commerce required for the delivery of fresh seafood, resulting in a small overall increase in commerce in the system.

TEXT.English: The presence of the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cattle[COLOR_REVERT] resource increases a planet's food output as it is naturally utilized by the colonists. However, it also allows the introduction of an extensive ranching industry with only a modest outlay in industrial and infrastructural improvements, allowing the planet to support a larger productive population. The Ranch is not just a ranch, but an organized and widespread ranching industry. This includes the on-going efforts into improving the breeds of cattle and ranching techniques with the goal of having a high but sustainable output. In addition to the food uses, various byproducts of the animals have industrial uses resulting in a small increase in industrial output in the system.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wine[COLOR_REVERT] resource represents the presence of large quantities of varieties grapes useful for making wine. These are not sufficient to increases a planet's food output significantly, but can be used to produce wine. As a luxury good, wine increases commerce output as it is produced in modest quantities by the colonists. However, it also allows the introduction of an extensive wine industry with only a modest outlay in industrial and infrastructural improvements, resulting in additional increases in commerce and increased trade with other star systems. Due to the importance of wine in many cultures, large scale production also has a larger increase in influence than the other resource related industries. The Winery is not just a winery, but a widespread and well regulated wine producing industry and network of wine merchants.

TEXT.English: The presence of the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cotton[COLOR_REVERT] resource increases a planet's commerce output as it is naturally utilized by the colonists. However, it also allows the introduction of an extensive cotton textile industry with only a modest outlay in industrial and infrastructural improvements, resulting in additional increases in commerce, increased trade with other star systems, and some direct cash profits. The Cotton Mill is not just a cotton mill, but an organized and widespread cotton growing system and network of cotton mills.

TEXT.English: Training skilled squadron pilots requires training which is different from the training of pilots for larger ships. The weapon systems and tactics are different, the squadrons can maneuver in ways larger ships cannot, and the degree of situational awareness that must be maintained is much greater if you intend to survive a dogfight. This training is done at a flight school where it begins in classrooms, proceeds to hours of practice in simulators with detailed performance reviews, leading to more hours of practice in actual ships.

TEXT.English: The environment in which a moonbase is built makes it necessary to develop specialized technologies to build a large scale permanently inhabited colony. Many of these technologies are within the vacuum engineering realm. Once all the technologies are developed it is a relatively simple matter to create a viable permanent settlement on a moon. The primary issue is that large scale settlements can not produce enough food to sustain themselves, even with extensive recycling, requiring a small but steady stream of food imports. For practical purposes, a moonbase typically has a relatively large proportion of engineers, many of whom just keep the base functioning properly, and scientists in its population as moons are excellent locations for telescopes and other scientific projects.

TEXT.English: Build a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Moonbase[COLOR_REVERT] to increase the population limit of a planet by 1. Since the extra population is on an airless moon with low gravity it does not provide any food to the system, although a small amount of [ICON_RESEARCH] is produced.

TEXT.English: The nanoextraction upgrade improves the efficiency of mining operations by injecting specialized nanites into the rock. These nanites serve several purposes. One function is to seek out specific materials and emit a signal, allowing the mining operation to more accurately map the concentration of the desired elements to decide where to mine. Other nanites actually weaken the stone or bond to deposits of the target substance, the former to improve the ease of extracting the ore and the latter to improve the efficiency of extracting the desired materials from the ore.

TEXT.English: A [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Nanoextraction Upgrade[COLOR_REVERT] to a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mining Facility[COLOR_REVERT] increases [ICON_PRODUCTION] output when the Star System has population assigned to the Planet it's built upon.

TEXT.English: A nanoseparation system does everything that the standard nanoextraction upgrade does, and more. Through proprietary design improvements it is capable of simultaneously identifying and extracting a wider range of substances that are in the ore, including trace amounts of minerals and elements which a standard nanoextraction facility does not normally look for. It also has the ability to separate different isotopes of elements. This does not give any significant productivity boost to the star system, but it does provide an increase in commerce.

TEXT.English: Nanotech hospitals provide the same types of services as regular hospitals but also include facilities for using nanotechnology. The facilities allow for superior microsurgical procedures, such as reconnecting severed nerves. A nanotech hospital includes equipment for producing nanites and the ability to tailor their design to have new effects, such as hunting down and destroying a new strain of a virus.

TEXT.English: A Public Broadcasting System is one of the most cost-effective ways for a planet to increase its income. Unlike the highly competitive and loosely regulated commercial satellite systems, a PBS operates in a more heavily regulated environment requiring a greater amount of the available bandwidth to be devoted to educational content and a reduced amount of advertising. This does not seem to reduce the benefits to commerce but does slightly increase the amount of research (some claim that it is because the less interesting content leads people to do anything to avoid it, for students this even includes homework).

TEXT.English: A Research Institute functions much like the standard research lab. Due to the relatively academic nature of the Avower culture and the way the functioning of the research institute is integrated into the social network of a star system, it increases the happiness level of the population in a way that is not possible elsewhere.

TEXT.English: Providing all the functionality of a standard spaceport, each Space Park also includes additional recreational facilities. These additional facilities draw on the expertise that dates back to the origins of Paradise as a resort world.

TEXT.English: The Space Park increases [ICON_GOLD] output directly and [ICON_COMMERCE] from Trade Routes, providing both more raw commerce and more money for the treasury when Commerce %% is allocated to Gold, although it requires a Banking System already be built on the Planet. Unlike a spaceport, it also provides +1[ICON_CULTURE].

TEXT.English: The Star Citadel increases the strength of starships when defending inside this Star System even more effectively than the standard star fortress, making the Star System harder to capture. It also gives +1 Trade Route.

TEXT.English: In addition to serving the traditional functions of a university, the Technical Institute provides education in various practical engineering and production techniques. The result is a relatively small but steady stream of skilled workers and low level managers who provide a measurable increase in production.

TEXT.English: The presence of the Office of the Auditor General increases the efficiency of tax collection and simplifies financial reporting in the star system as it can be handled locally rather than going through the capital, improving these for other nearby systems too. It also monitors the banking system and various financial markets, investigating irregularities and prosecuting financial wrongdoers. As it keeps a close eye on things it not only reduces errors but also reduces corruption. Greater efficiency and reduced corruption leads to an improved economy.

TEXT.English: Much like the Arsenal of Venice on ancient Earth, The Arsenal introduces improved techniques for large scale manufacturing of ships (although in this case it is starships rather than sailing ships).

TEXT.English: In some ways the Universal Foundry is the opposite of the Industrial Complex. The Industrial Complex produces huge volumes of identical parts and assembles them into complete devices. While the Universal Foundry can produce large numbers of identical parts, typically assembled at some other site, it can also rapidly produce items that are one of a kind. This is very useful for producing prototypes of new designs and many other things that are only used in small quantities. The use of micromanufacturing's nanotechnology allows the casting of parts down to only a few molecules in size and the control of the small scale features of larger objects in a way that was previously thought impossible.

TEXT.English: The Workers' Memorial is a compound and monument dedicated to all the workers who have made sacrifices to help the survival of others and the colony as a whole.

TEXT.English: A Cryogenic Granary expands on the functionality of an ordinary granary with the addition of a cooling system. Food that can be frozen without damaging it is frozen and stored at very low temperatures; other foodstuff is stored at higher temperatures, but still mostly cooled below the normal room temperature of human habitats. The efficiency of this sort of system is greatly improved by use of vacuum engineering technologies which make these large scale storage facilities possible. The system also includes refrigerated transports and widely distributed flash freezing systems allowing crops to be preserved shortly after they are harvested..

TEXT.English: The Industrial Complex is a large scale expansion of a manufacturing plant merged with basic raw material extraction and refining into a complete vertically integrated system. Raw ore and power goes in, finished goods come out.

TEXT.Italian: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Institute for Advanced Research[COLOR_REVERT] greatly increases the scientific output of its star system.
TEXT.Spanish: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Institute for Advanced Research[COLOR_REVERT] greatly increases the scientific output of its star system.

TEXT.English: An Interstellar Exchange is the primary exchange for stocks and commodities for the entire civilization.
TEXT.French: An Interstellar Exchange is the primary exchange for stocks and commodities for the entire civilization.
TEXT.German: An Interstellar Exchange is the primary exchange for stocks and commodities for the entire civilization.
TEXT.Italian: An Interstellar Exchange is the primary exchange for stocks and commodities for the entire civilization.
TEXT.Spanish: An Interstellar Exchange is the primary exchange for stocks and commodities for the entire civilization.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Interstellar Exchange[COLOR_REVERT] doubles its star system's production of wealth.
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Interstellar Exchange[COLOR_REVERT] doubles its star system's production of wealth.
TEXT.German: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Interstellar Exchange[COLOR_REVERT] doubles its star system's production of wealth.
TEXT.Italian: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Interstellar Exchange[COLOR_REVERT] doubles its star system's production of wealth.
TEXT.Spanish: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Interstellar Exchange[COLOR_REVERT] doubles its star system's production of wealth.

TEXT.English: In order to improve the efficiency of operating a government which spans multiple star systems, a regional governmental center can be constructed. This second facility reduces the distance which citizens must travel to reach the higher authorities. One of the primary functions of this alternate government center is to receive, investigate, and act on complaints against government officials - these investigations are run by the Ombudsman.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Office of the Ombudsman[COLOR_REVERT] reduces the maintenance costs in nearby star systems.
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Office of the Ombudsman[COLOR_REVERT] reduces the maintenance costs in nearby star systems.

TEXT.Spanish: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Office of the Ombudsman[COLOR_REVERT] reduces the maintenance costs in nearby star systems.

TEXT.English: Methods of passing down the tactics and arts of war from generation to generation vary based on culture and era. The War College is the currently prefered solution. One paramount function of this institution is to stay current in the practice of warfare, typically by having officers from previous conflicts become instructors.

TEXT.English: All military units built in the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]War College's[COLOR_REVERT] star system begin with four additional prestige points. It can not be built until you have a level 5 unit.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]National Epic[COLOR_REVERT] starts a golden age when completed. It also increases happiness in the star system, gives it a large increase in [ICON_CULTURE], and reduces its maintenance cost.
